params_xml.title: Word order 2: adverbs with the verb

params.instruction_str: Are the underlined verbs OK? Change them where necessary.

params.instruct_panel_str: If you are unsure about how the animation above works click the "Instructions" button for help

mcq_xml.attemptsFailFeedback_str: The interaction will now be completed for you.
mcq_xml.attemptsRemain_xml: <text>You have </text><val id="attempts"/><choose id="attempts"><sgl> attempt</sgl><pl> attempts</pl></choose><text> remaining.</text></attemptsRemain_xml>
mcq_xml.multiAnswerFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="score"/><text> out of </text><val id="total"/><text> correct.</text>
mcq_xml.markedFeedback_xml: <text>You got </text><val id="percent"/><text>% for this marked interaction.</text>

question.start_text: <u>Jamie doesn't often go</u> to the cinema on his own.
question.correct_text: Jamie doesn't often go to the cinema on his own.
question.modelAnswerString: Jamie doesn't often go to the cinema on his own.No change was necessary

question.start_text: <u>I can never find my calculator</u> when I want it.
question.correct_text: I can never find my calculator when I want it.
question.modelAnswerString:
I can never find my calculator when I want it.
No change was necessary

question.start_text: <u>Timothy and Joan live still</u> in the same house.
question.correct_text: Timothy and Joan still live in the same house.
question.modelAnswerString: Timothy and Joan still live in the same house.

question.start_text: <u>The weather isn't so bad usually</u> at this time of year.
question.modelAnswerString: The weather isn't usually so bad at this time of year.
question.correct_text: The weather isn't usually so bad at this time of year.

question.start_text: That man in the red jacket <u>is probably a policeman</u>.
question.correct_text: That man in the red jacket is probably a policeman.
question.modelAnswerString:
That man in the red jacket is probably a policeman.
No change was necessary

question.start_text: Gary is going to France this year, and <u>he's also going to Italy</u>.
question.correct_text: Gary is going to France this year, and he's also going to Italy.
question.modelAnswerString:
Gary is going to France this year, and he's also going to Italy.
No change was necessary

question.start_text: My job is boring. <u>I have to do always</u> the same thing every day.
question.correct_text: My job is boring. I always have to do the same thing every day.
question.modelAnswerString: My job is boring. I always have to do the same thing every day.

question.start_text: He said he would visit but <u>he never does</u>.
question.correct_text: He said he would visit but he never does.
question.modelAnswerString:
He said he would visit but he never does.
No change was necessary

question.start_text: <u>John should soon find out</u> if he passed the exam.
question.correct_text: John should soon find out if he passed the exam.
question.modelAnswerString:
John should soon find out if he passed the exam.
No change was necessary

question.start_text: <u>They all were laughing</u> at Simon's funny joke.
question.correct_text: They were all laughing at Simon's funny joke.
question.modelAnswerString: They were all laughing at Simon's funny joke.
